import requests
import json
import pandas as pd

launchpad_url = "https://api.spacexdata.com/v4/launchpads"
headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json"}

response = requests.get(launchpad_url)
launchpad_data = response.json()

df_dim_launchpads = pd.json_normalize(launchpad_data)
#dropping and renaming columns
df_dim_launchpads.drop(columns=['images.large', 'launches', 'timezone', 'rockets'], axis=1, inplace=True)
df_dim_launchpads.rename(columns={'id': 'launchpad_id', 'name': 'launchpad_name', 'status': 'launchpad_status'}, inplace=True)

#reordering columns
cols = df_dim_launchpads.columns
new_cols = ["launchpad_id"] + [c for c in cols if c != "launchpad_id"]
df_dim_launchpads = df_dim_launchpads[new_cols]
df_dim_launchpads

df_dim_landpads = pd.json_normalize(landpad_data)
df_dim_landpads.drop(columns=['launches', 'wikipedia', 'images.large'], axis=1, inplace=True)
df_dim_landpads.rename(columns={'id': 'landpad_id', 'name': 'landpad_name', 'type': 'landpad_type'}, inplace=True)
cols = df_dim_landpads.columns
new_cols = ["landpad_id"] + [c for c in cols if c != "landpad_id"]
df_dim_landpads = df_dim_landpads[new_cols]
df_dim_landpads
